inputsClass.name: itemSizePx
inputsClass.rawdescription: The size of the items in the list (in pixels).
inputsClass.description: The size of the items in the list (in pixels).

inputsClass.name: maxBufferPx
inputsClass.rawdescription: The number of pixels worth of buffer to render for when rendering new items. Defaults to 200px.
inputsClass.description: The number of pixels worth of buffer to render for when rendering new items. Defaults to 200px.

inputsClass.name: minBufferPx
inputsClass.rawdescription:
The minimum amount of buffer rendered beyond the viewport (in pixels).
If the amount of buffer dips below this number, more items will be rendered. Defaults to 100px.
inputsClass.description: The minimum amount of buffer rendered beyond the viewport (in pixels). If the amount of buffer dips below this number, more items will be rendered. Defaults to 100px.

inputsClass.name: offsetSizePx
inputsClass.rawdescription: The size of the offset (in pixels).

propertiesClass.name: _scrollStrategy
propertiesClass.defaultValue:
new VirtualScrollWindowStrategy(
    this.itemSizePx,
    this.offsetSizePx,
    this.minBufferPx,
    this.maxBufferPx
  )
propertiesClass.description: The scroll strategy used by this directive.
propertiesClass.rawdescription: The scroll strategy used by this directive.
